heading: HR00734
0: RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE CIRCUMSTANCES SURROUNDING THE CASE OF PASKUHAN VILLAGE IN PAMPANGA, HOW THE HANDLING COURT REGIONAL TRIAL COURT BRANCH NUMBER 42 OF SAN FERNANDO, PAMPANGA RESOLVED THE SAID CASE, AND WHY THE SAME COURT APPROVED THE COMPROMISE AGREEMENT INVOLVING THE ILLEGAL CONVEYANCE OF PASKUHAN VILLAGE CONSIDERED AS A CULTURAL VILLAGE, RESULTING IN THE MANIFEST AND GROSS DISADVANTAGE OF THE GOVERNMENT AND TO THE DETRIMENT OF THE FILIPINO PEOPLE DUE TO THE LOSS OF PASKUHAN VILLAGE
principal-authors: GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR. D.; PIMENTEL, JOHNNY TY;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-03-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00734
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE CIRCUMSTANCES SURROUNDING THE CASE OF PASKUHAN VILLAGE IN PAMPANGA, HOW THE HANDLING COURT REGIONAL TRIAL COURT BRANCH NUMBER 42 OF SAN FERNANDO, PAMPANGA RESOLVED THE SAID CASE, AND WHY THE SAME COURT APPROVED THE COMPROMISE AGREEMENT INVOLVING THE ILLEGAL CONVEYANCE OF PASKUHAN VILLAGE CONSIDERED AS A CULTURAL VILLAGE, RESULTING IN THE MANIFEST AND GROSS DISADVANTAGE OF THE GOVERNMENT AND TO THE DETRIMENT OF THE FILIPINO PEOPLE DUE TO THE LOSS OF PASKUHAN VILLAGE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GONZALES, AURELIO "DONG" JR. D., PIMENTEL, JOHNNY TY
DATE FILED : 2020-02-26
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2020-03-03
